trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded"></xref> event or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded"></xref>事件或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this delegate to implement virtual mode in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要實作虛擬模式中的使用這個委派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的虛擬模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
